meta_description: The Jansen Art Center is a place for artists to create, teach, share, and engage the community in the arts
hours_text:
### Visiting us from out of town? Lynden is full of activities and full of surprises! Here are some of our suggestions to make your trip memorable.

For more information about visiting Lynden, Bellingham and the surrounding area: check out [Bellingham Whatcom County Tourism](https://www.bellingham.org/).

# **ACCOMODATIONS**

### The Inn At Lynden

##### **Located in the[Historical Waples Building](https://www.google.com/search?rlz=1C5CHFA_enUS929US929&q=Historical+Waples+Building&ludocid=6598407405144533143&lsig=AB86z5VgD6XwRnKoMLq0UG9ZSgLA&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwiGtonOubXtAhXHITQIHS6oBhcQ8G0oADATegQIGRAB)  
**100 5th St, Lynden, WA 98264

The 100-year-old Waples Mercantile Building is the vibrant home for the Inn at Lynden, one of a select few hotels in Washington State that reside in a structure listed on the National Registry of Historic Places. Each of the 35 rooms offers stylish and serene comfort in a setting that highlights the building’s rich history. Visitors love the warm ambience of the wood flooring and supporting beams cut from ancient Douglas Fir trees and set in place over 100 years ago.

[ __BOOK A ROOM](https://innatlynden.com/ "Book a Room")

admission_text:
## Become a Member of the J

Welcome to The J’s Membership page. We are excited to share our new membership levels and benefits for 2025, including Invitation-only Events, Insider Gallery Experiences, Meet the Artist & Director Events, and recognition in our Annual Report.

As of January 2, 2025, we ended our membership discount program. However, all active memberships purchased in 2024 will continue to be honored. This change helps us manage rising operating costs while sustaining high-quality classes and exceptional arts programming.

If you need financial assistance, our[ Financial Scholarship Fund](https://www.jansenartcenter.org/financial-scholarships/) ensures the arts remain accessible to everyone.

Thank you for being part of our creative community. Your membership supports arts, connection, and accessibility for all. For questions or comments, please contact us at [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection).

## How to Join

Choose the benefits and annual amount that works for you, then click the link below or sign up in person and start enjoying your benefits!

[ __BECOME A MEMBER](https://jansenartcenter.app.neoncrm.com/forms/membership "BECOME A MEMBER")

#### Already a Member?

Access all your membership information in our easy-to-use portal. [Click here to log in](https://jansenartcenter.app.neoncrm.com/np/clients/jansenartcenter/login.jsp).

## Become a Member of the J

collections_text:
World Class Facilities

World-Class Facilities

Our studios and galleries are designed with artists in mind, providing the tools, atmosphere, and professional setting needed to create, explore, and share your work with the community.

[Learn More](https://www.jansenartcenter.org/about-us/)

Expert Instruction

Expert Instruction

Our programming connects you with expert instructors who share their knowledge, skills, and passion. You will gain professional guidance that builds confidence and inspires growth in your creative work.

[Find a Class](https://www.jansenartcenter.org/classes/all-classes/)

Community

Creative Community

The Jansen Art Center is a welcoming place where creativity connects people. From exhibits and performances to classes and events, our community thrives on sharing and celebrating the arts together.

[Learn More](https://www.jansenartcenter.org/exhibitions/)

Convening Space

Your Gathering Space

The J offers inviting spaces to meet, study, or work, all surrounded by art. With free Wi-Fi and a comfortable atmosphere, it’s a place to meet others, share ideas, and be part of a creative community.

[Learn More](https://www.jansenartcenter.org/classes/all-classes)

[2026 Winter Exhibit Opening Reception | Thursday, January 22, from 6 to 8pm](https://www.jansenartcenter.org/exhibitions/)
